Subject: urn:altinn:rolecode:REGNA
urn:altinn:rolecode:DAGL
urn:altinn:org:dsb
Rules.Description: A rule giving user with role REGNA or DAGL and the app owner dsb the right to instantiate a instance of a given app of dsb/uhell-med-eksplosiver

Subject: urn:altinn:rolecode:REGNA
urn:altinn:rolecode:DAGL
Rules.Description: Rule that defines that user with role REGNA or DAGL can read and write for dsb/uhell-med-eksplosiver when it is in Task_1

Subject: urn:altinn:rolecode:REGNA
urn:altinn:rolecode:DAGL
Rules.Description: Rule that defines that user with role REGNA or DAGL can delete instances of dsb/uhell-med-eksplosiver

Subject: urn:altinn:org:dsb
Rules.Description: Rule that defines that org can write to instances of dsb/uhell-med-eksplosiver for any states

Subject: urn:altinn:org:dsb
Rules.Description: Rule that defines that org can complete an instance of dsb/uhell-med-eksplosiver which state is at the end event.

Subject: urn:altinn:rolecode:REGNA
urn:altinn:rolecode:DAGL
urn:altinn:org:dsb
Rules.Description: A rule giving user with role REGNA or DAGL and the app owner dsb the right to read the appresource events of a given app of dsb/uhell-med-eksplosiver

Subject: urn:altinn:org:dsb
Rules.Description: dsb can delete an instance of dsb/uhell-med-eksplosiver in any task or event.
